Change the view to any FMXL file, for example the info screen and high score scene.

Used for if you want to change levels to a new level in the main menu screen
checkCarDeath() - Method in class actor.PlayerTest
Checks that when the frog is moved to collide with an obstacle it dies.
checkEnd() - Method in class level.Game
Checks if the player has won the game and if so launch winning screen and return to main menu.
checkEndGoal() - Method in class actor.PlayerTest
Checks the end goals are initialised properly
checkGameOver() - Method in class level.Game
Checks if the player has ran out of lives and hit game over!
checkIfAtEnd() - Method in class actor.player.Player
Check if the player is at an end goal of the level and if so change the goals state and reset the frog to the start.
checkIfSunken() - Method in class actor.player.Player
Check if the Turtle the player is on is sunken or not, if so set water death.
checkLogCollision() - Method in class actor.PlayerTest
Checks that when the frog is on a log but above water it will not drown.
checkPoints() - Method in class actor.PlayerTest
Checks the points are correctly set.
checkSingelton() - Method in class actor.PlayerTest
Check we are always getting the same object reference.
checkWaterCollision() - Method in class actor.PlayerTest
Checks that when the frog is above water it will drown.
checkWaterDeath() - Method in class actor.PlayerTest
Checks the water levels are initialised properly
checkXBounds() - Method in class actor.PlayerTest
Checks that the frog remains with the X bounds of the screen.
checkYBounds() - Method in class actor.PlayerTest
Checks that the frog remains with the Y bounds of the screen.
clearState() - Method in class actor.player.deathcontroller.DeathController
Sets the death state back to normal/ alive.
clearState() - Method in class actor.player.walkingcontroller.WalkingController
Clears the walking state, so frog is neutral facing which ever way it last moved.
constructorTest() - Method in class actor.EndTest
Ensures the end gates are constructed correctly
constructorTest() - Method in class actor.PanningActorTest
Check PanningActors can be constructed properly.
createTimer() - Method in class application.World
Creates an animation timer, this is the main timer used throughout the whole program which states what frame the program is in and that the actors need to do their next frame.
currentLevel - Variable in class application.scoreboard.ScoreBoardModel
